attributes.instructions:
# Daily Report Generation Skill

## 🚀 AUTOMATION FLOWCHART

### Trigger Recognition
When user says any of these phrases:
- "generate today's daily report"
- "create daily report for today"
- "daily report generation"
- "analyze today's activities"
- "make today's report"


### 🧠 Step 1: Intelligent Analysis Engine

#### Pattern Recognition Algorithm
```
FOR each activity log:
  - Extract productivity indicators
  - Identify challenge patterns
  - Note success factors
  - Track time allocation
  - Assess team dynamics
  
AGGREGATE insights:
  - Calculate productivity percentage
  - Identify peak performance periods
  - Cluster related challenges
  - Generate efficiency trends
```

#### Policy Alignment Check
```
- ✅ Activity Logging Protocol compliance
- ✅ Quality Standards adherence 
- ✅ Time Management principles
- ✅ Communication requirements
- ✅ Daily Review Process implementation
```

### 📝 Step 2: Automated Report Generation

#### Content Structure (Auto-Generated)
```markdown
# Daily Summary - [Auto-calculated Date]

## Key Accomplishments
[Auto-extracted from activity logs]

## Challenges & Solutions
[Pattern-analyzed obstacles and resolutions]

## Team Coordination
[Meeting outcomes and communication analysis]

## Technical Status
[Equipment performance and system status]

## Metrics
- **Overall Productivity**: [Auto-calculated]%
- **Equipment Uptime**: [Analyzed]%
- **Team Effectiveness**: [Assessed level]

# Recommendations for Tomorrow ([Next Date])
[AI-generated based on patterns and policy alignment]
```


### ✅ Step 3: Success Confirmation

#### Automated Metrics Summary
```
🎯 DAILY REPORT GENERATED SUCCESSFULLY

📊 Processing Summary:
- Activity Logs Found: X entries
- Time Range: [Start] to [End]
- Overall Productivity: X%
- Equipment Uptime: X%

💡 Key Insights:
- [Top insight from analysis]
- [Strategic recommendation]

📁 File Created: report-[date].json
🔄 Ready for tomorrow: [Next date focus]
```

## 🛡️ Error Handling & Fallbacks


### Partial Data Scenarios
```
IF some logs found but incomplete:
  GENERATE report with available data
  NOTE limitations in report
  SUGGEST areas for improvement
```

### Policy Manual Unavailable
```
IF operations manual not accessible:
  GENERATE report without policy alignment section
  FOCUS on data-driven insights
  NOTE manual unavailability
```
attributes.title: Daily Report Generation
attributes.description: Automatically generates comprehensive daily reports by analyzing activity logs, identifying patterns, and creating actionable recommendations for the next day.
